body: i am analysing indoor comfort for an office building. I want the analysis to run from 10am to 6pm for everyday of a given month. how do i achieve that?
topic: Restricting analysis time but not month

replies.body: Hi Nishant, [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vwzIt05Fr11IGHP58jskph4jcg7Z8eGeKJ-H-qt6E2Cm1j9KkuTVRGlZh4dKN-t3xBnKXVkw3W3t7yY-pL0MDIwrgLF4E*Vv/Capture.JPG) Is this what you're looking for? -Devang

Thanks! but it seems like i misframed my question. is there any way to do it for the whole year?

(jan-10am to 6pm

feb- 10am to 6pm

...)

If you want to do it for the whole year, disconnect the panel from _toMonth.

If you want Jan 10 am to 6 pm - Feb 10 am to 6 pm, Change it to "2" in the panel attached to _toMonth.

Hope this helps!
thats not what i want to do. i want the program to run the analysis for the whole year (all 365 days), but just between 10am to 6pm.
One way to go about this would be to set schedule.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vwzIt05Fr10f34MrTFju1Yd5FYUdkeLpWwdBLve7bKT8cJ3P05IAcy6*LHur2Wpm5sheRxoCmi9YUj-yu4Sh01RAwStqgk9z/Schedule.JPG)
